div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 77: Ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvarastutiḥ

lg.l: ḍākinīṃ ca tathā lāmāṃ khaṇḍarohāṃ ca rūpiṇīm /

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 78: Sattvārādhanagāthā ārya nāgārjunakṛtā

lg.l: sattvārthameva mayi tiṣṭhati sattvaśraddhā nānyatra sā, hyahamaho 'dhigṛhītasattvaḥ /
caryā 'dhamā karuṇayā rahitā bhaved yā saṃbhāvyate karuṇayaiva prahāṇamasyāḥ //
sattveṣu yasya nitarāṃ karuṇāpravṛttirārādhakaḥ sa mama śāsanamarmavettā /
śīlaṃ śrutiśca karuṇā ca sudhośca yasya nityaṃ sa eva sugatārcanakṛnnigadyate //
kalyāṇakāramadhikṛtya gato 'smi siddhiṃ sattvārthameva tanumeṣa samudvahāmi /
naivaṃ kriyeta yadi sattvahitaṃ mayā ced vyarthaṃ karomi tanupoṣaṇamannapānaiḥ //
sattvān hinasti manasāpi hi yaḥ sa kasmānmāmeva saṃśrayati yo mayi nirvyapekṣaḥ /
pūjā tu sā bhavati sattvahitekṣaṇāpi pūjyasya yā manasi tuṣṭimupādadāti //
hiṃsātmikā paraviheṭhanasambhavā vā pūjā na pūjyamanugacchati saṃskṛtāpi /
dārāḥ sutāśca vibhavaśca mahattva(cca) rājyaṃ māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitavase nayate śarīram //
yeṣāṃ priyatvamadhikṛtya mayojjhitaṃ yat yastān viheṭhayati tena viheṭhito 'ham /
sattvopakāraparamā hi mamāgrapūjā sattvāpakāraparayā ca parābhavaḥ syāt //

sattvān prāpya mayā kṛtāni kuśalānyārādhitāstāyinaḥ
prāptāḥ pāramitāśca sattvasamiterevārthamātiṣṭhatā /

sattvārthena samudyatena manasā mārasya bhagnaṃ balaṃ
sattvaireva tathā tathā viracitaṃ yenāsmi buddhaḥ kṛtaḥ //

kasmin vastuni siddhyatāmiha kṛpā maitrī ca kvālambatāṃ
kvopekṣāmuditādivastuviṣayaḥ kasmin vimokṣādayaḥ /

kasyārthe karuṇāpareṇa manasaḥ kṣāntiściraṃ bhāvitā
na syurjanmani janma(ni) priyavidhau mitraṃ yadi prāṇinaḥ //

sattvā eva gajādibhāvagatayo dattā mayā 'nekaśaḥ
sattvā eva ca pātratāmupagataṃ deyaṃ mayā grāhitāḥ /

sattvaireva vicitrabhāvagamanādasmatkṛpā vardhitā
sattvāneva na pālayāmi yadi cet kasyārthamarthaḥ kṛtaḥ //

saṃsāre vyasanābhighātabahule na syuryadi prāṇino
janmāvartaviḍambanena yamalokaṃ prāpya sātmīkṛtāḥ /

saṃsārāttaraṇaṃ ca saugatamidaṃ mahātmyamatyadbhutaṃ
kasyārthena samīhitaṃ yadi na me sattvā bhaveyuḥ priyāḥ //

yāvaccedaṃ jvalati jagataḥ śāsanaṃ śāsanaṃ me
tāvat stheyaṃ parahitaparairātmavadbhirbhavadbhiḥ /

śrutvā śrutvā mama viracitaṃ sattvahetorakhinnaiḥ
khedaḥ kāryo na ca tanumimaṃ muktasāraṃ bhavadbhiḥ //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 79: Śākyasiṃhastotram brahmaṇā kṛtam

lg.l: prāptaṃ tvayā jñānamanantadharmaṃ yenākariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam //
pravartitaṃ yena sudharmacakraṃ yasmin mahī sodadhiśailarājā /
ānanditeva calitā hyajasraṃ namo 'stu tubhyaṃ tribhavādhipāya //
yasmiṃśca vātāstriguṇena yuktā vavurnabhasto nipatanti vastrāḥ(rṣāḥ) /
vicitrapuṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namo 'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha //
jitaṃ tvayaikena nirāyudhena namo 'stu tubhyaṃ balavartanāya //
tuṣitāyuto janma cakāra martye namo 'stu tubhyaṃ varabodhirāja //
samyak pratijñāṃ pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure janaughaḥ /
tadarthamāyāsi ca martyaloke namo 'stu tubhyaṃ sumahatpratijña //
yaścāṣṭakaṃ brahmakṛtaṃ supuṇyaṃ paṭhiṣyati śākyavarāgrataḥ sthaḥ /
duḥkhaṃ mahāpāpabhayaṃ ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 80: Śākyasiṃhastotram

lg.l: babhāṇa vaṃśasthaviro nṛpādhipo janān pratītyāhvayatātmajaṃ mama /
kṛtāribhaṅgaṃ jinarājamīśvaraṃ gataṃ ṣaḍabdaṃ ca viyogabhāvayoḥ //
bhajasva vaṃśasthaviraṃ munīśvaraṃ mahāvane vṛkṣatale śucisthale /
prāśiṣṭa brahmā caturānanaṃ svakaṃ caturguṇaṃ puṇyamavāptamityaho //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 81: Śākyasiṃhastotram durgatipariśodhanoddhṛtam

lg.l: lāsyā mālā tathā gītā nṛtyā devīcatuṣṭayam /
puṣpā dhūpā ca dīpā ca gandhādevī namo 'stu te //
vedikādau sthitā ye ca catasro dvārapālikāḥ /
muditādau daśa sthitvā bodhisattva namostu te //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 82: Śākyasiṃhastotram navagrahakṛtam

lg.l: praṇamāmi ca lokahitāya gṛhaṃ vijahau pitaraṃ ramaṇīsahitam /
praṇamāmi tapovanasubhramitaṃ pracakāra ca yastu maharṣigaṇān /
praṇamāmi ca mallikapañcaśatā vaṇijaḥ pratipālanameva kṛtāḥ /
gurunirmitakaṃ sugatastavakaṃ paṭhanaṃ kurute kila yo manujaḥ /
graharogabhayaṃ nahi tasya sadā sa tu yāsyati mokṣapure supure //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 83: Śākyasiṃhastotram śaṅkarakṛtam

lg.l:
namāmi saugataṃ jinaṃ lasadvitānabhāsuraṃ
sahasrasūryarociṣaṃ śaśāṅkakoṭinirmalam /

namo 'stu pālabhuṃ jagaccakāra janma mānavaṃ
viśuddhaśākyasāgare payonidhau śaśī yathā /

kathāsudhāmayo 'dhunā vinodayiṣyate bhavān
trijālamohatāmasaṃ vināśayiṣyase jvalan //

sthitāya bodhimaṇḍape hitāya lokasaṃcaya
jitāya mārasainyakaṃ śritāya sattṛṇāsanam /

sujātaśākyabhūpateryutāya pāramārthakai-
rvṛtāya bodhisaṃvarairnamo 'stu dharmarāja te //

bhajāmi bhavyabhāvukaṃ bhavasya bhāvabhedakaṃ
subodhivaibhavodbhavaṃ subhādrikaṃ śubhāṃśikam /

bhavaughabhārabhedituṃ babhāra bodhibhārakaṃ
subhadrabhānubhāsvaraṃ subhāvitaṃ śubhāvaham //

hiraṇyaratnavedikākuśāsanasthitaṃ vibhuṃ
namāmi śākyasaugataṃ tathāgataṃ varaṃ sadā //

paṭhanti ye jināgrato vinirmitaṃ hareṇa tat
supañcapañcacāmaraṃ trikālameva maṅgalam /

sukīrtidharmasaṃyutaṃ lasanti sapta vṛddhayo
vrajanti te sukhāvatīṃ sukhena satsukhāvatīm //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 84: Śākyasiṃhastotram surapatikṛtam

lg.l:
naubhi śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ sakalahitakaraṃ dharmarājaṃ maheśaṃ
sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ trimalavirahitaṃ saugataṃ bodhirājam /

dharmādhāraṃ munīndraṃ daśabalabalinaṃ śrīghanaṃ viśvarūpaṃ
saṃbuddhaṃ lokanāthaṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ saṃsthitaṃ martyaloke //

yastvaṃ dharmādhimeśaṃ(peśaḥ) sakalajinasutaiḥ saṃśritaḥ śvetaketu-
rityākhyāṃ bodhihetustadanu ca tuṣitā cāgatā bodhirāja /

maitreyaṃ sthāpayitvā pramuditamanasaṃ svāsane cābhiṣiñcya
māyāgarbhe pavitre 'śucimalarahite ratnavyūhe niveśa //

garbhe sthitvā 'pi yastvaṃ sakalahitakarīṃ dharmavyākhyāṃ karoṣi
kāle mātuḥ sukakṣātsakalanijakaraiḥ kāśayat saṃprajātaḥ /

lokācāraṃ ca kṛtvā vihitadaśavidhiṃ vai vivāhādi tattat
tyaktvā sarvāṃśca rājyaṃ sakalajanahite nirgataṃ tvāṃ name 'ham //

catvāriṃśatsudantodgalitakaracayairbhāpayannārakīyān
proddhṛtvā svargaloke suratarukalite sthāpitā yena vande //

yatpāṇī cakracihnāvabhimataphaladau dānapāraṃgatatvo-
dyatkāntā bhūmidevī svagaṇaparivṛtā bhedayitvā 'vaniṃ tām /

sthitvāgre pūjayitvā namucimabhigataṃ bhartsayitvā dviṣantaṃ
sākṣībhūtā nilīnā praṇamitaśirasā tvāṃ name 'haṃ jinendram //

yasyodgrīvasya cāgre vidhiharamadhuhṛllokasaṃsthaiḥ pravīṇair
draṣṭuṃ naivābhiśaktyā kimu manujapure vāsitairmādṛśaiśca /

brahmāṇḍaṃ laṅghayitvā taraṇiśaśadharau dyauśca nakṣatralokaṃ
ūrdhvaṃ lokottarākhye nijabhuvanavare bhāsitaṃ tvāṃ name 'ham //

yadvaktraṃ paṅkajābhaṃ suradanavasanākarṇikākesarāḍhyaṃ
brahmāṇḍaṃ jūmbhate 'smin bhuvanagaṇavṛttaṃ saṃśritaṃ karṇikāvat /

dṛṣṭvā saṃmūrcchito 'bhūnnamuciranucaraistrāsi sarvajñanātha
kṛtvā kecitprayātāḥ śaraṇamabhimataṃ śrīghanaṃ tvāṃ name 'ham //

saṃkhyājñānapravīṇāstribhuvanasadane paṇḍitā ye vasanti
taiḥ sarvairmīlayitvā yadi tava mahimā varṇyate kalpakālam /

pāraṃ gantuṃ samarthā nahi nikhilaguṇakṣīrasindhoḥ kathañcid
ekākī kiṃ samarthāstadapi mama mano bodhanārthaṃ name tvām //

paṭhyante stotrametatsurapatiracitaṃ sragdharāvṛttasaṃjñaṃ
śakrādyā lokapālāḥ pratipadanucarāḥ saṃkariṣyanti rakṣām /

saukhyaṃ bhuktveha loke tadanu surapateḥ kalpavṛkṣābhikīrṇe
sthitvā gacchanti cānte sugatasutamahīṃ sarvalaukaikagamyām //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 85: Śākyasiṃhastotram viṣṇukṛtam

lg.l: name śrīghana tvāṃ sadābhāvabhakto bhavāmbhodhisetuṃ lasanmokṣahetum /
tridhātuṃ vidhātuṃ surakṣāṃ virakṣāṃ sudakṣaṃ sukakṣāṃ sujātaṃ sudāntam //
name bodhirājaṃ sugamye virājaṃsuramye vane devarājādigamyam /
caturmāralokaṃ mahadvīryavantaṃ jayantaṃ hasantaṃ trijālaṃ ca kālam /
kṣamānaddhadehaṃ name muktagehaṃ trilokyaikanāthaṃ tathā śākyanātham //
name mārasainyaṃ jitaṃ yena sarvaṃ nirastreṇa sāhāyyamuktena nūnam /
name śītavyañjairlasaddehagehaṃ jane snehavantaṃ vane gehavantam /
name dharmameghāsthitaṃ supratiṣṭhaṃ kalau nāthahīne bhaveyaṃ sanāthaḥ /
tathā pālituṃ svāṃ pratijñāṃ cakāra janiṃ śākyavaṃśe mahīpāvataṃse //
name bhāgyato labhyate darśanaṃ te tathā bhāgyabhājo svayameti buddhiḥ /
sthito dharmameghe kathaṃ darśanaṃ syād vihīnā na tatrābhigantuṃ praśaktāḥ //
tathāsmācchirāṃsi pavitrāṇi satyaṃ cariṣyāmi bodhiṃ bhavacchāsanena //
bhujaṅgaprayātaṃ kṛtaṃ mādhavena paṭhed yo jinasyāgratastho hi nityam /
sadā maṅgalaṃ tasya gehe sudehe prasannāśca rakṣāṃ kariṣyanti buddhāḥ //
trijālaṃ ca chitvā sukhāni prabhuktvā tathā dānaśīlādipāraṃgatāśca /

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 86: Śākyasiṃhastotram yaśodharākṛtam

lg.l: hitvā pravrajito yo 'sau taṃ darśaya jagadgurum //
lumbinyāmudayāt sūrya iva taṃ pitaraṃ nama //
traidhātukādhipaṃ devaṃ pitaraṃ tvaṃ sadā nama //
nirmāninaḥ prābhajan yamenaṃ tātaṃ sadā nama //
svayaṃ vijño 'pi papraccha sadā taṃ janakaṃ bhaja //
nirañjanaṃ nirvikalpaṃ suta taṃ janakaṃ bhaja //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 87: Śāradāṣṭakastotram

lg.l: yā bhāratīti kathitā jananī ca loke mohāndhakārabharabhagnakṛtāṃ janānām /
saṃkīrtitā munibhirastasamastadoṣaiḥ śrīśāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //
ratnaiḥ śubhaiḥ surucirāṃ kṛtahastapadmāṃ śrīśāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //
pūjyā sadaiva jananī parivandanīyā devyā gaṇā manasi saṃparimodanīyāḥ /
jīvārthinaḥ phalabhṛto guṇavarṇanā ca śrīśāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //
natvā bhajejjagati yo jananīṃ prasiddhāṃ kuryātsadā bhagavatī kilapañcasaukhyam /
saundaryarūpaguṇavittasubhogabhājaṃ śrī śāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //
yaiḥ pūjitā bhagavatī kila jāḍyahantrī śrīśāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //
dharmārthakāmaphaladāmatha mokṣadāṃ ca śrīśāradāṃ bhagavatīṃ satataṃ namāmi //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 88: Sragdharāpañcakastotram

lg.l:
vande 'haṃ tattvarūpaṃ tatavitatabhavaṃ bhavyahavyasvabhāvaṃ
buddhānāmādibuddhaṃ kṛtavividhahitaṃ tejasāṃ sannidhānam /

samyaksaṃbodhimūrti triguṇavilasitaṃ pañcajñānaikahetuṃ
nairākāraṃ nirañjaṃ gaganavadaniśaṃ nirmalaṃ cittacaityam //

jyotīrūpe tvadīye vinilayatapasā dānaśīlakṣamāsu
vīryadhyānākhyaprajñodadhikṛtataraṇo māṇivṛnde sujātau /

bodhiṃ prāpto 'smi cāsmin sakalapūravare cākaniṣṭhe mahimni
vande tvāṃ viśvarūpaṃ sphaṭikamaṇirivopāttanānāprabhedam //

nānā vaidhyaṃ supūjyopakaraṇamaniśaṃ ḍhaukitaṃ sarvalokai
kiṃ cāhaṃ ḍhaukayiṣye tvadanunayamanāstyaktarājyādidravyaḥ /

jātau jātau ca jātau kṛtasukṛtacayaṃ kāyavāṅmānasaistai-
statsarvaṃ ḍhaukayiṣye nijatanusahitaṃ saṃgṛhāṇa subuddhe //

ekaṃ yugmaṃ tṛtīyaṃ yugalayugamatho pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhasaṃjñaṃ
saptāṣṭau vai navākhyaṃ daśamamatha tathaikādaśaṃ dvādaśākhyam /

trāyodaśyaṃ caturdaśyamatha śarakamaṭhaṃ caikataḥ saṃprasūtam
ānantyaṃ svaṃ tadaivaṃ jagadakhilamabhūt tvāṃ name caikarūpam //

eko vairocanākhyastadaparajino buddha akṣobhyasaṃjñaḥ
ratnādyaḥ saṃbhavo 'sau tritaya amṛtaruksaṃjñakasturyasaṃkhyaḥ /

pañcākhyo 'moghasiddhistadanu ca jagati khyātasaṃkhyādyasaṃkhyā
devā daityāśca martyā bhavadavayavajāḥ sarvadā 'haṃ nato 'smi //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 89: Suprabhātastotram śrīharṣadevabhūpativiracitam

lg.l:
stutamapi surasaṅghaiḥ siddhagandharvayakṣair
divi bhuvi suvicitraiḥ stotravāgbhiryatīśaiḥ /

ahamapi kṛtaśaktirnaumi saṃbuddhamāryaṃ
nabhasi garuḍayāte kiṃ na yānti dvirephāḥ //

surucirapariveṣaḥ suprabhāmaṇḍalaśrīḥ
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

samasukhaphaladāturbhetturajñānaśailaṃ
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

svapiti manujadhātā abjayoniḥ svayambhūr
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

ravirapi madalolaḥ sarvathā so 'pi supto
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

dviradadaśanapāṇḍuḥ śītaraśmiḥ śaśāṅkas
tilaka iva rajanyāḥ sarvacūḍāmaṇiryaḥ /

avigatamadarāgaḥ sarvathā so 'pi supto
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

amalakamalayoniḥ so 'pi brahmā prasupto
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

saha girivaraputryā so 'pi suptastriśūlī
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

jvalitakuliśapāṇirdurjayo dānavānāṃ
surapatirapi śacyā vibhrame mūḍhacetāḥ /

aniśiniśiprasuptaḥ kāmapaṅke nimagno
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

harirapi cirasupto garbhavāsairamukto
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

smaraśaradalitāṅgaḥ so 'pi supto hutāśo
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

bala iha śayito 'sau revatīkaṇṭhalagno
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

gaṇapatirapi supto vāruṇīpānamatto
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

atasikusumanīlo yasya śaktiḥ karāgre
navakamalavapuṣmān ṣaṇmukhaḥ krauñcahantā /

trinayanatanayo 'sau nityasuptaḥ kumāro
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

ubhayagativihīnāste 'pi nagnāḥ prasuptā
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

ṛṣaya iha mahānto vatsabhṛgvaṅgirādyāḥ
kratupulahavasiṣṭhā vyāsavālmīkigargāḥ /

parayuvativilāsairmohitāste 'pi suptāḥ
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //

yamavaruṇakuberā yakṣadaityoragendrāḥ
divi bhuvi gagane vā lokapālāstathānye /

yuvatimadakaṭākṣairvīṃkṣitāste 'pi suptā
daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //
samasukhaparihīnā vāliśāste 'pi suptā daśabala tava nityaṃ suprabhātaṃ prabhātam //
kāle śubhāśubhaphalaṃ parikīryamāṇe jāgarti yaḥ satatameva namo 'stu tasmai //
tīrtheṣu gokulaśatāni pibanti toyaṃ tṛptiṃ vrajanti na ca tatkṣayamabhyupaiti /
tadvanmune kaviśatairapi saṃstutasya na kṣīyate guṇanidhirguṇasāgarasya //
punaḥ prabhātaṃ punarutthito raviḥ punaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ punareva śarvarī /
mṛtyurjarā janma tathaiva he mune gatāgataṃ mūḍhajano na buddhyate //
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ va praṇamāmi dine dine //

stutvā lokaguruṃ mahāmunivaraṃ saddharmapuṇyodgamaṃ
nirdvandvaṃ hatarāgadveṣatimiraṃ śāntendriyaṃ nispṛham /

yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ khalu mayā tenaiva loko 'khilaṃ
pratyūṣastutiharṣito daśabale śraddhāṃ parāṃ vindatām //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 90: Svayaṃbhūstavaḥ

lg.l:
tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva-
stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ /

tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ
tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ //

bhūtāḥ pretāścatiryak tvamamaramaditimārnavāstvaṃ vayaṃ ca
cāturyonistvameva triguṇavaratanuḥ pañcajñānaikamūrtiḥ /

varṇāstvaṃ kālamāsā dinamapi rajanī pañcabhūtāstvameva
annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ //

pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca-
bhūtānetān guṇāṃstrīnajaharigiriśān sthāvarāñjaṅgamāṃśca /

sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako 'si
tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ //

śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
grāmāṃstīrthāni deśān nṛpasahitanarān naigamāṃścāpi sarvān /

dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
bījībhūtaikadīpo 'syakhilamapi jagadvayāpakastvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ //
dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 91: Svayambhūstotram

lg.l: ayaṃ ka ityayaṃ hṛdā mīmāṃsituṃ na śaktavān /
paṭhanti ye narā mudā svayaṃbhuvaḥ stutiṃ sadā /

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 92: Vāgīśvaravarṇanāstotram

lg.l: jñānādhipaṃ guṇamayaṃ guṇavṛddhimantaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //
yaṃ kīryayanti munayo naravāṇyabhijñaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //
jñānapradhānakaśarīramacintyabuddhiṃ vācaspatiṃ divi bhuvi stutakīrtidaṃ tam /
jñāneśvaraṃ tribhuvaneśacarācaraṃ taṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //
sarvajñakārakadharād hṛdi brahmapuñjaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //
caryāvidhau ratipatiṃ sthiradhairyabodhiṃ dhyānādhipaṃ vividhinā sukharañjanīyam /
vidyāpratiṣṭhitaguruṃ bhuvanetipūrṇaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //
vāṇīpatiṃ bhujacatuṣṭayabāṇacāpaṃ pustaṃ kṛpāṇamaniśaṃ kramaśo dadhānam /
sarveṣṭadaṃ jagati yaccaṇāravindaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ namāmi //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 93: Vāgvāṇīstotram

lg.l: iti samyak stutā devī vāgīśena mahātmanā //
sarasvatyuvāca varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadanta yatte manasi vartate //
bṛhaspatiruvāca prasannā yadi me devī divyaṃ jñānaṃ pradīyatām /
sarasvatyuvāca stotreṇānena ye bhaktyā māṃ stuvanti sadā narāḥ //
kavitvaṃ matprasādena tathā ca vipulaṃ yaśaḥ //
trisandhyaṃ prayato bhūtvā yaḥ stotraṃ paṭhate naraḥ /
tasya kaṇṭhe sadā vāsaṃ kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ //

div.p: om aiṃ vāgvādini mama jihvāyāṃ eeṃ hrīṃ mantrasarasvati svāhā / bṛhaspatikṛtaṃ śrīvāgvāṇīstotraṃ samāptam //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 94: Vajradevīstotram ācāryanāgārjunaviracitam

lg.l:
ḍākī yā sarvabuddhā sakalabhayaharā vyāpinī viśvamātā
ekāsyā raktavarṇā trinayanamuditā khecarī śreṣṭhaśobhā /

prajvālī divyadehā gagaṇakṛtapadā dvibhujā muktakeśā
khaṭvāṅgaṃ vāmapāṇau dahinakaratikādhāriṇī svargarupā //

nagnāṅgā grīvamālyā naraśirasahitā bhūṣaṇaṃ pañcamudr
sattvānāṃ mārgamokṣā 'nuttaravaradā jñānasiddhipradātā (trī) /

śrīdevī prāṇirakṣākṛtajagatahitā yoginī vajradīpti-
stvatpādau padmarūpau praṇamitaśirasā naumi vidyādharīśe //
vande pādāmbuje nityaṃ bhajāmi tvāṃ prasīda me //
samudbhūtāṃ sadā devīṃ vande tāṃ jñānaḍākinīm //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 95: Vajramahākālastotram ācāryanāgārjunakṛtam

lg.l:
hāṃ hāṃ hāṃkāranādaiḥ kilikilitaravaiḥ bhūtavetālavṛndair
hu huṃkāraiḥ samantānnarapiśitamukhai raktamālākulāṅgaiḥ /

khaṭvāṅgaskannapāṇirnarakarakadharaḥ kāmarūpī virūpī
piṅgākṣaḥ piṅgakeśaḥ śavagaṇanalakaḥ kṣetrapālo 'vatādvaḥ //

pheṃ pheṃ pheṃkāranādaiḥ pratijanitabṛhadvahnigarbhāṅgavaktre
mālāṃ kaṇṭhe nidhāya prakaṭabhayavapurbhūṣitāṅgopaśobhaḥ /

īṣadraktādharoṣṭho 'sṛkasakalavṛtāmālinā muktapāṇiḥ
klīṃ ḍāṃ klīṃ ḍāṃ ninādairvaradahanabhuvi kṣetrapaḥ pātu yuṣmān //

kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣāntimūrtiḥ kalakalakalakṛt kṣāntivṛddhiṃ prakurvan /
krāntākrāntaikaviśvaḥ kahakahakathano nīlajīmūtavarṇaḥ /

hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mantradehaḥ paca paca dahanairjātamantraḥ samantād
vighnānutsāryamāṇaḥ śamayatu niyataṃ śātravān kṣetrapālaḥ //

hā hā hā hāṭṭahāsairatiśayabhayakṛt sarvadā 'satpaśūnāṃ
pāpānām, vighnahantā pratidivasamasau prāptasaṃbodhilābhaḥ /

huṃ phaṭ huṃphaṭaninādaistribhuvanakuharaṃ pūrayan pūrṇaśaktiḥ
pāyācchrīkṣetrapālaḥ kapilatarajaṭājūṭakleśāṅgabhāraḥ //

khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgapāṇirlalalalalalito rūpato raktapāṇiḥ
raṃ raṃ raṃ raktanetro ru ru rudhirakaraścarcitaścaṇḍavegaḥ /

kruṃ kruṃ kruṃ krodhadṛṣṭiḥ kuha kuha kuṭilaḥ kuñcitāśeṣaduṣṭaḥ
ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍāmarāṅgo ḍamarukasahito rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ //

yaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yāti viśvaṃ yamaniyamayuto yāmino 'yāmino vā
vaṃ vaṃ vaṃ vātavego jhaṭiti karakadhṛt prāptalokopacāraḥ /

bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhīṣaṇāṅgo bhṛkuṭikṛtabhayo muktivān sādhakānāṃ
kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣemakārī kṣapayatu duritaṃ rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ //

klāṃ klāṃ klāṃ krāntimūrtistribhuvanamaniśaṃ kledayan sarvadā yaḥ
paṃ paṃ paṃ pāśahastaḥ paraśudhṛtakaraḥ pālayan pālanīyān /

mudrāṇāṃ mantramūrtistvamabhimataphalado mantriṇāṃ mantratulyaḥ
kṣetrāṇāṃ pālako 'sau sakalajitatanuḥ pātu yuṣmāṃścirāyuḥ //

klīṃ klīṃ klīṃ kṛttivāsā kṛtaripuniyamaḥ kleśitānāṃ sadeśaḥ
kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kapālamālī kalikaluṣaharaḥ kālavṛndābhakāyaḥ /

caṃ caṃ caṃ caṇḍavegaḥ pracaritasamayāḥ kālabhūtaikalokaḥ
saṃ saṃ saṃ saṃyatātmā samayaśubhaphalaṃ lakṣyatāṃ pātu yuṣmān //

mantrāṇāṃ manrakāyo niyatayamadyutiḥ satpathe śūddhatīre
ācāryaḥ sādhako vā japati ca niyataṃ puṇyavān jāyate 'sau /

āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtilakṣmīrdhṛtibalamatulaṃ śāntipuṣṭī prabhā ca
sarvajñatvaṃ ca nityaṃ dinaniśamatulaṃ naśyate vighnajātam //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 96: Vajrapāṇināmāṣṭottaraśatastotram
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 97: Vajrasattvastotram

lg.l:
vajrasattvaṃ bhuvanavaraguruṃ sarvabuddhaṃ bhavantaṃ
nānārūpaṃ jinendraṃ timirabhayaharaṃ nirmitaṃ meruśāntam /

dharmādhāraṃ munīnāṃ jinaguṇaśubhadaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vajradhātuṃ
sarvānandaikarūpaṃ paramasukhamayaṃ dehināṃ mokṣahetum //
jñānaṃ prakāśya paripūritavīryadhyānaṃ śrīvajrasattvamasamaṃ śirasā namāmi //

buddhaṃ trailokyanāthaṃ suravaranamitaṃ pārasaṃsāratīrṇaṃ
dhīraṃ gāmbhīryavantaṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ dharmarājābhiṣiktam /

tṛṣṇāmohāndhakāraṃ kalikaluṣaharaṃ kāmalobhādavantaṃ
taṃ vande śākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamitaśirasā sarvakālaṃ namāmi //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 98: Vajrasattvastutiḥ
div.p: atha khalu bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ bhagavantaṃ mahāvajrasattvaṃ stuvanti sma-

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 99: Vajravilāsinīstotram mahāpaṇḍitavibhūticandrapādakṛtam

lg.l: tvayi rodimi nutisavyapadeśaḥ kiṃ paśyasi punaraniśamaśeṣam //
mātardevi kirasi kaṇamuṣṭiṃ janayad yajñasutaḥ kimatuṣṭim /
vajravārāhi narāhisurāṇāṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ tava nāmaparāṇām //
mātardevi nibhālaya mahyaṃ kiṃ sahase mama duḥkhamasahyam //
ḍākinye (va hi) viśvamaśeṣaṃ loko vetti na te bahuveṣam //
mūḍho vetti na duṣkṛtakarma prāvṛṣīva na śilāṅkurajanma //
cintāmaṇimajñā na vidanti prajñe tvasya phalāni phalanti //
taddiśāmi tava devi samakṣaṃ yāvadyāmi na durgatipakṣam /
manaḥ paramārthaṃ tanustava vedī sa bhavati naiva duritaparikhedī //
kiṃ tvaṃ mātaḥ kariṣyasi tābhiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatakoṭyabalābhiḥ /
yadyanyāṃ manute bahutātastadvihāya jhagiti dehi nu mātaḥ //
tvadbhaktyā yadalambhi śubhaṃ me bhavatu mano bhavatīparamaṃ me /
sakalakaluṣarahitaṃ guṇasindhustvatparamaṃ hyata eva na bandhuḥ //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 100: Vajravilāsinīsādhanāstavaḥ

lg.l: ubhayakoṭikalāpinirīkṣaṇe na ca śaśī na vibhāti divākaraḥ //
vrajati cordhvamasau vaḍavānalo gilati rāhuradhaḥ śaśibhāskarau //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 101: Vajrayoginīpraṇāmaikaviśikā

lg.l: śaive śaktiriti khyāte tīrthe caṇḍīti kalpite /
puṇyaṃ yadavāptaṃ tena janāḥ santu(labhantu) pūrṇatvam //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 102: Vajrayoginyāḥ piṇḍārthastutiḥ siddhācāryavirūpādaviaracitā
div.p: om namo vajrayoginyai / om namo buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaḥ / om namo gurubuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ / om namo locanādidaśavajravilāsinībhyaḥ / namo yamāntakādidaśakroḍha(dha) vīrebhyaḥ / vārāhī śauṇḍinī caiva caṇḍālī ḍombinī tathā /

lg.l: naṭanī rajakī brāhmī kapālinī ca sāsa(śāśva) tā //
śāśvatatvāt sthitā proktā śāśvatena ca varjitā //
ityeṣā ṛddhidā proktā siddhidā caiva yoginī /
vajravat kurute dehaṃ rasasiddhiṃ dadāti ca /

div.p: śrīguhyasamayatantre piṇḍārthāḥ ṣoḍaśaślokāstrikāyavajrayoginyāḥ samāptāḥ / kṛtiriyaṃ siddhācāryaśrīvirupādānāmiti //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 103: Vajrayoginyāḥ stutipraṇidhānam siddhācāryavirūpādaviracitam

lg.l: om namaḥ śrī vajrayoginyai, namobuddhadharmasaṃghebhyaḥ, namo gurubuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ, namo locanādidaśavajravilāsinībhyaḥ, namo yamāntakādidaśakrodhavīrebhyaḥ saprajñebhyaḥ /
om o ā hūṃ iti kāyavākacita indriyavijñānāni, vākacittāni manovijñānāni, paracittajñānābhijñā, parakāyapraveśābhijñā puṇḍarīkeṣu nābhisthe raktasūrya maṇḍalaḥ //
tadbhavā pītavarṇā ca avadhūtyā(tī) svayaṃ sthitā //
lalanāyāṃ tu suśyāmā rasanāyāṃ ca gaurikā /
asyā vāme sthitā śyāmā nāmnā sā varavarṇinī //
karparaḥ savyahaste ca kartirvāme ca saṃsthitā /
dakṣiṇe caiva pītā vai vajravairocanī sthitā //
karau ca dvau tayoḥ pādau viparītau tathā sthitau /
akṣayā subhagā nityaṃ hantrī ca mṛtyujanmanoḥ /
daurmanasyādi kartyā ca kartantī sarvameva tat //
svārthaṃ kartuṃ parārthaṃ ca bhavāmyahaṃ yathā kṣamaḥ //
gurubhaktiṃ na jāne 'haṃ tvadbhaktiṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
kāyavākacetasāṃ sāmyaṃ kuru me tvaṃ prasādataḥ /
yena muñcāmi saṃsāraṃ ṣaḍgatiṃ na viśāmyaham //
māraiḥ sarvaiḥ parityakto yathā kāyo bhavenmama //
dehi me tvaṃ varāṃ siddhiṃ hitvā caiva gamāgamam //

div.p: śrīguhyasamayatantre trikāyavajrayoginyāḥ stutipraṇidhānaṃ samāptam / kṛtiriyaṃ siddhācārya śrīvirūpādānām //

div.head: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 104: Vasantatilakāstutiḥ
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 105: Vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīstotram

lg.l: bhagavatyai āryaśrīvasudhārāyai divyarūpī surūpī ca saumyarūpī balapradā /
vidyādharī śivā sūkṣmā śāstā sarvatra mātṛkā /
brahmāṇī vedamātā ca guhyā ca guhyavāsinī /
namaste divyarūpī ca vasudhārā namo 'stu te //
aṣṭottaraśataṃ nāma trikālaṃ yaṃ paṭhet pumān /
ante bhūmīśvaraṃ prāptaḥ paścāt prāpta(ḥ) sukhāvatīm //

lg.l: yā samyaguktavidhibhiḥ paripathyamānā lakṣmīṃ dadāti vipulāṃ sugatopabhogān /
